content:
I am planning a trip to the richest country in Africa I have not been to before. Can you provide me with the details of the country, including its capital, region, and currency? Additionally, I would like to know the list of states within the country and their respective latitude and longitude.
Begin!

Question:  While I can help with parts of your request, I need clarification.  Which country are you referring to as the "richest country in Africa"?  The definition of "richest" can vary (GDP per capita, total GDP, etc.), and the answer might change depending on the metric used.  Please specify which metric you're using to define "richest" so I can accurately identify the country.

name: country_details_for_referential_db
content: The tool output is {"error": "", "response": "{'id': '161', 'name': 'Nigeria', 'code': 'NG', 'iso3': 'NGA', 'capital': 'Abuja', 'region': 'Africa', 'subregion': 'Western Africa', 'native': 'Nigeria', 'currency': 'Nigerian naira', 'currency_code': 'NGN', 'phonecode': '234', 'timezones': '[{\"zoneName\":\"Africa/Lagos\",\"gmtOffset\":3600,\"gmtOffsetName\":\"UTC+01:00\",\"abbreviation\":\"WAT\",\"tzName\":\"West Africa Time\"}]', 'translations': '{\"kr\":\"\ub098\uc774\uc9c0\ub9ac\uc544\",\"pt-BR\":\"Nig\u00e9ria\",\"pt\":\"Nig\u00e9ria\",\"nl\":\"Nigeria\",\"hr\":\"Nigerija\",\"fa\":\"\u0646\u06cc\u062c\u0631\u06cc\u0647\",\"de\":\"Nigeria\",\"es\":\"Nigeria\",\"fr\":\"Nig\u00e9ria\",\"ja\":\"\u30ca\u30a4\u30b8\u30a7\u30ea\u30a2\",\"it\":\"Nigeria\",\"cn\":\"\u5c3c\u65e5\u5229\u4e9a\",\"tr\":\"Nijerya\"}', 'tld': '.ng', 'emoji': '\ud83c\uddf3\ud83c\uddec', 'latitude': '10.00000000', 'longitude': '8.00000000'}"}, remember to call Finish tool when either if you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

function.arguments:
{"final_answer":"Country: Nigeria
Capital: Abuja
Region: Africa
Currency: Nigerian naira

Note:  I do not currently have access to a database providing state-level latitude and longitude data for Nigeria.  To get that information, you would need to use a different tool or data source.","return_type":"give_answer"}
